member.summary: Wrapper class around PackageManifest object. Supports converting yaml manifest to json object.

member.summary: Wrapper class around WinGetUtil manifest native implementation. For dll entry points are defined here: https://github.com/microsoft/winget-cli/blob/master/src/WinGetUtil/WinGetUtil.h.
